## Load libraries

```{r}
library("tidyverse")
library("here")
library("fs")
library("readxl")
```

## Load data
```{r}
# Load metadata from sheet 1
meta_data <- read_excel(
  here("data/_raw/raw_data.xlsx"),
  sheet = "Suppl_Table1",
  skip = 3,
  na = c("NA", "--")
)

# Load RNA-seq expression data from sheet 10
expr_data <- read_excel(
  here("data/_raw/raw_data.xlsx"),
  sheet = "Suppl_Table10",
  skip = 1,
  na = "NA"
)
```

## Write files to data folder

```{r}
write_tsv(meta_data, here("data/meta_data.tsv"))
write_tsv(expr_data, here("data/expr_data.tsv"))
```
